name: Stitch and Stun stitch vs Creeper (2 player boss fight)
name_original: Stitch and Stun stitch vs Creeper (2 player boss fight)
description:
( Stitch and Stun Stitch vs Creeper! )

Player 1: asdw to move. Q to use big fist. E for gaster blaster R for bugger ._.

Player 2: arrow keys to move. B for big potion N for Stun Blaster and M for tiny potion
